sentences.sentence: While NATO leaders meet in Vilnius to talk about their future relationship with Ukraine, instructors from the Atlantic Alliance have been training Ukrainian soldiers in urban combat techniques.

sentences.sentence: Former Charles Manson cult follower Leslie Van Houten has been released from prison after serving 53 years of a life sentence. Van Houten was 19 when she was sentenced for her part in two notorious killings. In the late 1960s, cult leader Charles Manson directed his followers to commit nine murders, including that of actress Sharon Tate, hoping the killings would start a race war. Called Helter Skelter after a famous song by the Beatles, Manson died in prison in 2017.
